name: Channels and Beams tutorial
description: A tutorial to send notifications via Channels and fallback to Beams when users are offline

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for session management in this app

ENVIRONMENT.description: An environmental variable indicating which set of settings to use. Leave this as 'production' Enables secure cookies

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: The ID of the Github oauth app used for authentication

GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The secret key of the Github oauth app used for authentication

GITHIB_CALLBACK_URL.description: Relative callback URL for Github authentication. Leave as default

APP_ID.description: Channels app id. Find in Channels app settings

APP_KEY.description: Channels app key. Find in Channels app settings

CHANNELS_SECRET_KEY.description: Channels secret key. Find in Channels app settings

CLUSTER.description: Channels cluster. Find in Channels app settings

INSTANCE_ID.description: Beams instance id. Find in Beams instance settings

BEAMS_SECRET_KEY.description: Beams secret key. Find in Beams instance settings
